name: VRTK Space Escape Room
description:
This game is the product of the VRTK Livestream where we made a VR Escape Room using VRTK v4 over 8 streams. 

It should work on any PC based VR device using Oculus, SteamVR or Windows Mixed Reality

The first stream of the series can be found here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=POQaacxe1YE

It's a simple escape room where the player has to use their brain to work out how to launch the escape pod before the ship blows up.

Just press Alt+F4 to quit the game :p
